oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Teleportation of arbitrary $n$-qudit state with multipartite entanglement
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Zhang, Zhan-jun
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Quantum Physics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We propose a protocol ${\cal D}_n$ for faithfully teleporting an arbitrary $n$-qudit state with the tensor product state (TPS) of $n$ generalized Bell states (GBSs) as the quantum channel. We also put forward explicit protocol ${\cal D}'_n$ and ${\cal D}''_n$ for faithfully teleporting an arbitrary $n$-qudit state with two classes of $2n$-qudit GESs as the quantum channel, where the GESs are a kind of genuine entangled states we construct and can not be reducible to the TPS of $n$ GBSs.
